articles.description: Cardio exercises include any form of activity that causes your heart rate to increase and your breathing to quicken and raises oxygen and blood flow throughout the body.

articles.author: WION Desk
articles.title: 6 lifestyle factors that contribute to premature gray hair - WION
articles.description: 6 lifestyle factors that contribute to premature gray hair
articles.content: A shortage of essential nutrients, such as B vitamins and minerals, may trigger grey hair. However, a well-balanced diet has the potential to reverse this effect.
